content: k1 blue purl rest of row purling the blue and white stitches as they present themselves until last 2 stitches kfb k1 4 stars this row repeat row 3 and 4 twice with blue yarn row 25 rs kfb knit 4 blue k1 white k 5 blue to last 2 stitches k2tog=31 stitches row 26 ws k1 blue purl rest of row purling the blue and white stitches as they present themselves until last 2 stitches kfb k1 =32 stitches- 4 stars this row repeat row 3 and 4 twice 34 stitches row 31 rs kfb in blue k2 blue knit 1 white knit 5 blue end with k4 k2tog row 32 ws k1 blue purl rest of row purling the blue and white stitches as they present themselves until last 2 stitches kfb k1 35 stitches- 5 stars this row repeat row 3 and 4 twice with blue yarn row 37 rs kfb knit 5 blue knit 1 white repeat end with k4 blue k2tog row 38 ws knit 1 stitch purl until last 2 stitches purling the blue and white stitches as they come up kfb k1=38 stitches -5 stars this row repeat row 3 and 4 twice with blue yarn row 43 rs with blue kfb knit 2 blue k1 white knit 5 blue repeat ending with k4 blue and k2tog row 44 ws k1 blue purl rest of row purling the blue and white stitches as they present themselves until last 2 stitches kfb k1 =41 stitches 6 stars this row repeat row 3 and 4 twice row 49- with blue kfb knit 11 blue knit 1 white knit 5 blue repeat until 6 stitches left knit 4 knit 2 decrease- 5 stars worked this row row 50 ws k1 blue purl rest of row purling the blue and white stitches as they present themselves until last 2 stitches kfb k1 = 44 stitches repeat row 3 and 4 twice with blue yarn row 55 with blue kfb knit 14 blue knit 1 white knit 5 blue repeat until last 6 stitches knit 4 blue knit 2 decrease- 5 stars formed this row 2 row 56- k1 blue purl rest of row purling the blue and white stitches as they present themselves until last 2 stitches kfb k1 = 47 stitches repeat row 3 and 4 twice row 61kfb knit 17 blue knit 1 white knit 5 blue repeat end knit 4 blue k2tog- 5 stars worked row 62-k1 blue purl rest of row purling the blue and white stitches as they present themselves until last 2 stitches kfb k1 = 50 stitches total of 50 stars worked repeat row 3 and 4 twice stripe pattern row 1 in white only rs kfb knit to last 2 stitches k2 decrease row 2 in white only ws knit to last 2 stitches kfb knit 1 repeat row 1 and 2 in white cut white yarn and switch to red yarn weave the ends in as you go
